title: Horana 1.5A land with house facing main road
details: 5Km from Horana town, close to Balapittiya junction. House with land 240p (1.5A) facing busy Horana/Kaluthara main road. Over 150ft of property facing the main road. Access to property from 2 additional roads. Coconut and rubber and Jack trees. Well water available on property. Less than 1km from the nearest petrol station. Nice location for a business or hotel. Clear deeds. Call 0777170655
